author: blueelvis
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```
1. Open PowerShell as Administrator
2. Create a Scheduled Job using `Register-ScheduledJob -Name Hello` with a specified name.
3. Try `Unregister-ScheduledJob -Name Hello`.
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```
Scheduled Job is unregistered successfully and the task cache is cleared as well. Furthermore, if I run again Register-ScheduledJob with the same name, it should work without issue.
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```
Unregister-ScheduledJob : A scheduled job definition with Name Patch Windows could not be found.
At line:1 char:1
+ Unregister-ScheduledJob -Name 'Hello'
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : ObjectNotFound: (:) [Unregister-ScheduledJob], RuntimeException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : ScheduledJobDefinitionNotFoundByName,Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.UnregisterScheduledJobCommand
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```Name                           Value                                                                                                 
----                           -----                                                                                                 
PSVersion                      5.1.14393.1198                                                                                        
PSEdition                      Desktop                                                                                               
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                               
BuildVersion                   10.0.14393.1198                                                                                       
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000                                                                                       
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                                                                                   
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                                   
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1                                                                                               
```
title: UnRegister-ScheduledTask does not unregister properly
